text: The Shepherd Lassie of Argyle is a 1914 British silent drama film directed by Laurence Trimble and starring Florence Turner, Rex Davis and Hector Dion.Low p.300 ==Cast== * Florence Turner as Mary Lachan * Rex Davis as Alan MacPherson * Hector Dion as The MacPherson * Clifford Pembroke as Lachlan * Isobel Carma as Isobel * Arnold Rayner as The Maniac ==References== ==Bibliography== * Low, Rachael. The History of the British Film 1914-1918. Routledge, 2005. ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:1914 drama films Category:English-language films Category:British films Category:British silent feature films Category:British drama films Category:Films directed by Laurence Trimble Category:Films set in Scotland Category:British black-and-white films
title: The Shepherd Lassie of Argyle
